payload.name: sociotechnical-incident-response
payload.title: Sociotechnical incident response: convert failure into stronger contracts and rollback triggers
payload.formal: postmortems produce actionable countermeasures; automate rollback based on SLO/budget triggers.
payload.apm2_mapping: incidents should mint new defects and new gates. If a failure mode happens twice, governance failed. Tie rollback triggers to burn-rate and to explicit receipts, not human panic. This is how Phase‑1 recursion becomes monotonic improvement.
